description:
Today we get our first look at Steve McQueen’s 12 Years A Slave. Based on a true story, the film is said to be more brutal than his previous two efforts, Shame and Hunger. Considering that both of those, while excellent, were extremely tough watches, I cannot even imagine what McQueen has in store for us with his upcoming flick.由英国黑人导演史蒂夫·麦奎因执导的电影《为奴十二年》日前首次曝光剧照。这部影片根据真实故事改编，据说比麦奎因之前执导的《耻辱》和《饥饿》更加残忍无情。考虑到前两部优秀作品已经让人不忍目睹，很难想象此次麦奎因将带给我们怎样的震撼。

A slave drama set in the deep south, those who have seen it describe the film as “Django Unchained without the comedy.” It stars Chiwetel Ejiofor as Solomon Northup, “a free man tricked, captured and sold into slavery in the film based off of Northup’s autobiography.” Supporting Ejiofor are Benedict Cumberbatch, Michael Fassbender, Brad Pitt and Paul Giamatti, among others. Quite the cast, eh?本片讲述的是美国南部一个奴隶的故事，被描述成“严肃版的《被解救的姜戈》”。影片根据所罗门·诺瑟普的自传改编，讲述了这个自由黑人受骗后被绑架、并被卖为奴隶的故事。切瓦特·埃加福特将饰演所罗门·诺瑟普一角，此外，本尼迪克特·康伯巴奇、迈克尔·法斯宾德、布拉德·皮特和保罗·吉亚玛提都有参演，阵容非常强大。

12 Years A Slave releases on December 27th, 2013.《为奴十二年》将于2013年12月27日上映。
